text: Lili Pauline Reinhart (born September 13, 1996), commonly known as Lili Reinhart, is an American actress. She is known for played Betty Cooper in The CW teen drama series Riverdale and Annabelle in the comedy-drama movie Hustlers (2019). ==Early life== Lili Reinhart was born in Cleveland, Ohio. She grew up in the nearby town of Bay Village. She is of German and French descent, and has stated her surname is German. ==Personal life== Reinhart is a bisexual Christian. She practices Transcendental Meditation and is training to be a reiki healer. Reinhart was diagnosed with depression at 14 years old. She has also opened up about her experiences with anxiety and body dysmorphia. She came out as bisexual in June 2020. She was diagnosed with alopecia in January 2024. In January 2025, she revealed that she had interstitial cystitis, a chronic bladder condition from which she suffered a lot, calling the year prior to her diagnosis the "hardest year of my life". ==Filmography== ===Film=== Year Title Role Notes 2011 Lilith Lilith Wilson 2012 Not Waving But Drowning Amy 2013 The Kings of Summer Vicki Gibsonburg Kathy Colaner Forever's End Lily White 2016 Miss Stevens Margot Jensen The Good Neighbor Ashley 2018 Galveston Tiffany 2019 Hustlers Annabelle Charlie's Angels Angel Recruit Cameo 2020 Chemical Hearts Grace Town Also executive producer 2022 Jennifer Lopez: Halftime Herself Documentary film; interview clip Look Both Ways Natalie Also executive producer 2025 American Sweatshop Daisy Moriarty Also executive producer TBA Forbidden Fruits Filming ===Television=== Year Title Role Notes 2010 Scientastic!
